title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 22 ยง 1200.3.2 - Delay of litigation
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 22 ยง 1200.3.2 - Delay of litigation

State Regulations

In representing a client, a lawyer shall
not use means that have no substantial purpose other than to delay or prolong
the proceeding or to cause needless expense. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 22
ยง
1200.3.2. State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
